task.title: Share a report link
task.shortdesc: Steps that describe how to share a report by generating a report link (URL) to send to another user.

context.p: When the recipient clicks the link, the system requests login credentials (company name, user name, and password). After logging in, the recipient is shown the report generated by the original user. Standard permission restrictions apply.

step.cmd: Click More > Link to This Report.
